FuncDef: The display fips-mode finite-state command displays the historical records of FIPS mode status changes. The display fips-mode finite-state command displays the historical records of FIPS mode status changes.
CLIs: display fips-mode finite-state [ all | slot <slot-id> [ cpu <cpu-id> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the historical records of FIPS mode status changes in all slots.
-

Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the CPU ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.
